amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funding for the planning, design, or construction of improvements to Pennsylvania Avenue in front of the White House without the advance approval of the Committee on Appropriations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any funding for the planning, design, or construction of improvements to Pennsylvania Avenue in front of the White House withut the advance approval of the Committee on Appropriations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
